segments.text: Hello ! I'd like to get busy on my computer , but I need some broadband .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There's an Ethernet cable in your room . Just plug it into the back of your laptop .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Uh-oh ! I can't use Ethernet . My computer is wireless only .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's okay . I can tell you about some alternatives we have .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Any alternative that works will be great .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , there's our computer lab on the first floor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds good . What's the charge ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The lab and the computers are no charge , but you have to pay for whatever you print .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds good . Now , how about the other alternatives ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . Our lobby is set up for wireless , so just bring your computer down here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Use my laptop in the lobby ? That's great ! Now , if I need to print something there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They plan to install a printer here . But until then , you'll have to use the lab .
segments.speaker: S2
